channel.title: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting
channel.description: I have recently made a no-ip account, and made my hosts. How do i actually put this into my server and my client.

item.title: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting
item.dc:creator: @I_hate_fails I hate fails
item.source: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting

item.title: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting
item.dc:creator: @p00n99range p00n99range
item.description:
@p00n99range wrote:

[quote=“ohad, post:2, topic:412809”]well if you got a [pi] server go into source>src>server>server
just type ctrl+f and look for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 one of them should be their and change it with you ip…
for client go into client.java and look for same thing…
hope it helped :)[/quote]

Thank you

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting

item.title: Need Help[Teamviewer - if you can] - Changing [Pi]'s Server to start hosting
item.dc:creator: @ohad ohad
item.description:
@ohad wrote:

well if you got a [pi] server go into source>src>server>server
just type ctrl+f and look for 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 one of them should be their and change it with you ip…
for client go into client.java and look for same thing…
hope it helped

Read full topic
